sentences.sContent: The post office has promised to resume first class mail delivery to the area on Friday.
sentences.sCn: 邮局已承诺在星期五恢复该地区第一类邮件的递送。

sentences.sContent: He had promised that the rich and privileged would no longer get preferential treatment.
sentences.sCn: 他已承诺富人和特权阶层将不会再得到优待。

sentences.sContent: Promise me you will not waste your time.
sentences.sCn: 向我承诺你不会浪费你的时间。

sentences.sContent: I'll call you back, I promise.
sentences.sCn: 我会给你回电话的，我保证。

sentences.sContent: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.sCn: 如果你许下一个诺言，你就应该遵守它。

synos.tran: 允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望

phrases.pCn: [圣经]上帝允许给亚伯拉罕的地方；乐土；福地；希望之乡（等于Promised Land）

words.tran: 约定的；允诺的；约定支付的
充满希望地；大有可为地
许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: If you promise that you will do something, you say to someone that you will definitely do it
a statement that you make to a person in which you say that you will definitely do something or give them something
